traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: Oren can move through the space of any creature that is of a size large than his.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.desc: When Oren rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Stout Resilience
traits.desc: Oren has advantage on saving throws against poison

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage. Duvessa carries only one dagger.
